channel.title: Flowplayer on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flowplayer on David Moreno blog

item.title: Introducing Apache2::EmbedFLV â€“ Exposing FLVs with Flowplayer and a customized interface
item.description: Situation You have a bunch of Flash videos, FLV files. Every once in a while you dump new files on your publicly accessible Apache directory. You would like to give your users the ability to play those FLVs within a webpage you provide, instead of just serving them the files for a direct download. Maybe you want this for all FLVs, not only an specific directory. Solution Apache2::EmbedFLV! <Files ~ "\.
